align-content.description: Aligns flex or grid container’s items when there’s extra space on the cross-axis

align-items.description: Aligns flex or grid items along the cross-axis

align-self.description: Overrides align-items for a specific flex or grid item

animation-delay.description: Sets delay before an animation starts

animation-direction.description: Defines the direction of animation playback

animation-duration.description: Sets the duration of an animation

animation-fill-mode.description: Specifies how an animation applies styles before/after execution

animation-iteration-count.description: Sets the number of times an animation repeats

animation-name.description: Specifies the name of the @keyframes animation

animation-play-state.description: Controls whether an animation is running or paused

animation-timing-function.description: Defines the speed curve of an animation

background-attachment.description: Sets whether a background image scrolls with the content

background-clip.description: Defines how far the background extends within an element

background-color.description: Sets the background color of an element

background-origin.description: Specifies the origin position of a background image

background-position.description: Sets the starting position of a background image

background-repeat.description: Controls how a background image repeats

background-size.description: Specifies the size of a background image

border-bottom-color.description: Sets the color of the bottom border

border-bottom-style.description: Sets the style of the bottom border

border-bottom-width.description: Sets the width of the bottom border

border-color.description: Sets the color of all borders

border-left-color.description: Sets the color of the left border

border-left-style.description: Sets the style of the left border

border-left-width.description: Sets the width of the left border

border-radius.description: Rounds the corners of an element

border-right-color.description: Sets the color of the right border

border-right-style.description: Sets the style of the right border

border-right-width.description: Sets the width of the right border

border-style.description: Sets the style of all borders

border-top-color.description: Sets the color of the top border

border-top-style.description: Sets the style of the top border

border-top-width.description: Sets the width of the top border

border-width.description: Sets the width of all borders

bottom.description: Sets the position of an element from the bottom

box-shadow.description: Adds shadow effects to an element

box-sizing.description: Defines how the box model calculates width and height

clear.description: Specifies which sides of an element floating elements are not allowed

clip.description: Clips an absolutely positioned element (deprecated in favor of clip-path)

column-count.description: Specifies the number of columns in a multi-column layout

column-rule-color.description: Sets the color of the column rule

column-rule-style.description: Sets the style of the column rule

column-rule-width.description: Sets the width of the column rule

column-span.description: Specifies how many columns an element spans

column-width.description: Sets the minimum width of columns

display.description: Specifies the display behavior of an element

filter.description: Applies graphical effects like blur or color shift

flex.description: Shorthand for flex-grow, flex-shrink, and flex-basis

flex-basis.description: Sets the initial size of a flex item

flex-direction.description: Defines the main axis direction of a flex container

flex-grow.description: Specifies how much a flex item will grow

flex-shrink.description: Specifies how much a flex item will shrink

flex-wrap.description: Controls whether flex items wrap onto new lines

font-family.description: Specifies the font family for text

font-size.description: Sets the size of the font

font-style.description: Sets the style of the font

font-weight.description: Sets the weight (boldness) of the font

gap.description: Sets the gap between flex or grid items

grid-area.description: Specifies a grid item’s size and location

grid-auto-columns.description: Sets the size of implicitly created grid columns

grid-auto-flow.description: Controls how auto-placed grid items are arranged

grid-auto-rows.description: Sets the size of implicitly created grid rows

grid-column-end.description: Specifies where a grid item ends on the column axis

grid-column-start.description: Specifies where a grid item starts on the column axis

grid-row-end.description: Specifies where a grid item ends on the row axis

grid-row-start.description: Specifies where a grid item starts on the row axis

grid-template.description: Shorthand for grid-template-rows, columns, and areas

grid-template-columns.description: Defines the columns of a grid layout

grid-template-rows.description: Defines the rows of a grid layout

height.description: Sets the height of an element

justify-content.description: Aligns flex or grid items along the main axis

justify-items.description: Aligns grid items along the inline (row) axis

justify-self.description: Overrides justify-items for a specific grid item

left.description: Sets the position of an element from the left

line-height.description: Sets the height of a line

list-style-image.description: Sets an image as the list item marker

list-style-position.description: Sets the position of the list marker

list-style-type.description: Sets the type of list marker

margin.description: Sets the outer spacing around an element

max-height.description: Sets the maximum height of an element

max-width.description: Sets the maximum width of an element

min-height.description: Sets the minimum height of an element

min-width.description: Sets the minimum width of an element

object-fit.description: Specifies how an image or video fits its container

order.description: Sets the order of a flex or grid item

outline-color.description: Sets the color of an outline

outline-style.description: Sets the style of an outline

outline-width.description: Sets the width of an outline

overflow.description: Specifies how overflowing content is handled

padding.description: Sets the inner spacing within an element

perspective.description: Sets the perspective depth for 3D transforms

pointer-events.description: Controls whether an element responds to pointer events

resize.description: Controls whether an element is resizable

right.description: Sets the position of an element from the right

row-gap.description: Sets the gap between grid rows

text-align.description: Sets the horizontal alignment of text

text-decoration-color.description: Sets the color of text decoration

text-decoration-line.description: Specifies the type of text decoration

text-decoration-style.description: Sets the style of text decoration

text-indent.description: Sets the indentation of the first line

text-overflow.description: Specifies how overflowed text is displayed

top.description: Sets the position of an element from the top

transform-origin.description: Sets the origin point of a transformation

transition-delay.description: Sets the delay before a transition starts

transition-duration.description: Sets the duration of a transition

transition-property.description: Specifies the CSS property to transition

transition-timing-function.description: Defines the speed curve of a transition

vertical-align.description: Sets the vertical alignment of an inline or table-cell element

visibility.description: Controls the visibility of an element

white-space.description: Controls how white space is handled

width.description: Sets the width of an element

word-break.description: Controls how words break at line ends

z-index.description: Sets the stack order of positioned elements
